summary:
*My Hero Academia* is a popular Japanese manga and anime series created by K≈çhei Horikoshi. It's set in a world where most people have superpowers, called "Quirks." The story follows Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without a Quirk who dreams of becoming a superhero. He gains a Quirk from the world's greatest hero, All Might, and attends a superhero school.

The series has been a huge hit, with the manga selling over 100 million copies and the anime receiving lots of praise. It has also inspired many spin-offs, movies, and video games.
title: My Hero Academia
